translation: Yhi chhu aakh suvrah aakh yymikụ̄ alfaẓ aasy nạzl krụ̄ byyhi krụ̄ aasy nạzl tamikụ̄ mʿāny yʿny aḥkam. Byyhi krụ̄ aasy tth andr vaẓḥ th ṣaf ṣaf āyat nazl yuth tvhụ̄ tim āyat zạniv th mạniv.

Zina krvunụ̄ znanh, zna krvun mrd, prth akis timav andrh lạyiv aakh hth durh hrgah tim nythrh vrạe āsn. Tohyhi gczihh nh yimn don petth khdae sndis mʿāmls andr aakh dhrh thi rḥm yun yymhi sintụ̄ tim trạviyvukh ya szahs mnz kmy kriyvukh, chhiv he tvhụ̄ pczh kran Allah tʿālyā hs th ptimis dohs yʿny qyamts. Kyazi doshvunụ̄ petth ayman th pczh āsnụ̄ chhu mngan. Allah tʿālyā sndis ḥkms gczih tʿmyl sapdun. Byyhi spdin ḥạẓr tihindis aath szahs jmaʿthah aakh baaymann hnz. Yhi sza chhu timn don mujrmn yim āzad, ʿạql th balgh byyhi aanhrụ̄ āsn, yim ghlam āsn timn pnczah durh. Yim nh ʿāql ya balgh āsn tim chhinh mklfy. Yim nkaḥ vạlụ̄ āsn tihund sza chhu rjm, sngsạry yʿny tiyiczh kanhi layinhi yimav sintụ̄ tim marn.

Zany yʿny zna krvun chhunh nkaḥ kran mgr zna kar znanhi sintụ̄ ya mshrk znanhi sintụ̄, yimh zna kar znanh chhanh nkaḥ nythr kran mgr znakar mrds sintụ̄ ya mshrk mrds sintụ̄, yhi chhu ḥram āmut krnh baaymann petth.

Byyhi yim lvukh bdkạry hnz hanczh lagn pak damn znann tvpth krn nh tim pysh czor gvah pnnis dʿūyā hs petth, ps lạyiv tvhụ̄ timn lvukn shytth durh, tth chhi vnan ḥdi qdhf. Byyhi mah kriv kunhi mʿāmls mnz tihnz shhadt āyndh zanhh thi qbvl, yithi chhu tihindi ḥqh aakh ḥdah. Yime kya ge fasq. Timn āshi ạkhrts mnz thi sza fasq th nafrman āsnh mokhh.
Mgr yim lvukh tvbh krn aamhi thmt lagnh pth khdays brvntthh knhi byyhi snbhaln pnnụ̄ ḥalt, tth ṣvrts andr chuh Allah tʿālyā be shk setthah mghfrt krvun.

Byyhi yim lvukh hanczh lagn pnnyn mnkvḥh znann bdkạry hnz tvpth āsnkh nh tth petth czvr gvah kynhh thi, ps chhe timav andrh prth akụ̄ snz gvạhy yhe kh suh daphi czvrih phiri khdae sund qsm hạvith kh be shk suh chhu pnnis dʿūyā hs andr pziyvr.
Byyhi vanhi pvunczmhi ltthi be shk chhe ts petth khdae snz lʿnt hrgah suh aapuz vnh vunyv andrh chhu.
Byyhi spdi ts znanhi nishhi ys hanczh āshi āmcz lagnh ʿdhab yʿny szahi ḥbs, ya ḥdi zna dvur yylhi so czvri phiri qsm hạvith gvạhy diyhi kh yhi mrd chhu yqynaan aapuzvnan.

Byyhi vanhi so znanh pvunczmhi ltthi kh be shk chhu ghẓbi khda ts petth hrgah yhi mrd pvzvnan chhu. Aamhi ṭryqh vnnavns chhi vnan liʿān. Yhi liʿān chhu spdan tth ṣvrts andr kh khavnd laghi thmt pnnhi znanhi znahch. Bchs mtʿlq vnys yhi chhue nh myvn. Pnnhi mnkvḥh znanhi thmti zna lagnh sintụ̄yin khavnds nishhi czvr gvah mngnh. Hrgah tmụ̄ czvr gvah pysh krụ̄ tylhi yiyhi znanhi petth ḥdi zna jry krnh. Agr czvr gvah hykụ̄ nh tmụ̄ pysh krith tylhi yiyhi vannh ts czh kr yim alfaẓ byan. Hrgah tmụ̄ yim alfaẓ byan krụ̄nh tylhi yiyhi suh qạd krnh, ts yiyhi vannh ya krczh pnnis aapziyvr āsns aqrar nath van yim alfaẓ. Hrgah tmụ̄ pnnis aapzyvr āsns aqrar kvr tylhi yiyhi ts ḥdi qdhf dinh. Hrgah tmụ̄ yim alfaẓ vnụ̄ tylhi yin znanhi nishhi thi dvyimhi qsmkụ̄ alfaẓ vnnavnh. Hrgah so yim alfaẓ vannhi nishhi ankar kri tylhi yiyhi so qạd krnh, ts petth yiyhi jbr krnh kh ya kr czh mrds tṣdyq ya van yim alfaẓ. Hrgah tmhi mrds tṣdyq kvr, ts yiyhi tylhi ḥdi zna dinh. Hrgah so yim alfaẓ vnns petth rạẓụ̄ spz tylhi yin tim alfaẓ tsndi chantthi vnnavnh. Yylhi mrdn thi vnụ̄ yim alfaẓ yim ts vannụ̄ āsn, znanhi thi vnụ̄ tim alfaẓ yim ts vnnụ̄ āsn, yimn don mnz sapud liʿān vaqʿ, tihund nkaḥ czihyvn. Amis mrds chhunh jạyz amis znanhi sintụ̄ ṣḥbt krnụ̄ ya thph krnụ̄. Yim sạry chyz spdụ̄ amis petth ḥram, tvpth hrgah amis znanhi ṭlaq diyhi, thi gvv jan, vrnh kri qạẓụ̄ yimn don mnz tfryq yʿny jdạyy hund ḥkm. Aamhi jdạyy hund ḥkm chhu ṭlaqi bayn. Amis mrds chhunh amis znanhi sintụ̄ zanhh nkaḥ krun jạyz mgre vanhi mrd kh me vvn aapuz tylhi yiyhi amis mrds ḥdqdhf dinh. Tamhi pth chhu timn don nkaḥ krun jạyz.
Byyhi hrgah nh tohyhi petth khdae sund fẓl āsiha, suh nniraviha ḥqyqt ḥal. Tmụ̄ kr pnnhi fẓl v rḥmt sintụ̄ tohyhi prdh pvshy. Pzipạtthụ̄ Allah tʿālyā chhu setthah tvbh qbvl krvun, setthah ḥkmt vvl.

Pzipạtthụ̄ yim lvukh nyvulue aapuz hyth āe yʿny hanczh lạjikh pakh sndis pak vjvds, ḥẓrt aumu almvmnyn ʿāyshh ṣdyqh hs rẓy Allah ʿnha. Tim lvukh th chhi tohy andrh aakh jmaʿthah yimn hund tʿda kum czvr avs, timv andrh avs aakh mvuly shryr, baqy ạsụ̄ tmụ̄ sndụ̄ tạbʿ. Aamhi qsuk khlaṣh chhu yy zi nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm yylhi jngi bny mṣṭlqh nishhi vaps āe yus jng she)6( hjry ys mnz sapudmut chhu, ḥẓrt am almvmnyn ʿāyshh ṣdyqh rẓy Allah tʿālyā ʿnha thi ạs aath sfrs mnz nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn sintụ̄. So ạs alg akis avuntts petth svar. Amis avuntts petth avs ʿiimary yʿny hvdj yivan thavnh. Tth ʿmary sụ̄ prdh yivan travnh, tvpth ạs tshryf thavan tth mnz ḥẓrt am almvmnyn. Aamhi pth ạsụ̄ avuntth vạlụ̄ yivan thi yhi ʿmary tulan tvpth avuntts petth thạvith kasan. Aakhi doh avs qaflh akis mqams petth tthhrith. Qaflh kh rvangy brvntth phn pyyhi ḥẓrt am almvmnynn qẓae ḥajtch ẓrvrt. Tim drayhi ʿmary mnz hna dvur phn qẓae ḥajt krnh khạṭr. Atfaq sapd tathi kh tihnzi hatthi chh malhi czihyvn pan th so āyhi chhkravnh. Yimav hytụ̄ tmikụ̄ danh sombravunụ̄. Aath sintụ̄ lvg timn vqt tvpth yylhi tim vaps āe qaflh avs dramut. Aamhi jayhi nishhi khbr kvt vvtmut. Avuntth vạlụ̄ ạsụ̄ āmtụ̄, timav ạs yihnz ʿmary tujmcz yymhi khyalh kh am almvmnyn āsn aath mnz kyazi tihund sin avs timn dohn kme byyhi avs tihund jsm thi lvtue. Bdn avs nḥyf, avuntth valyn avs nh tihund gobyr zyadh kynhh lgan. Chnanchh timv tul tihund hvdj yhi khyal krith kh yim āsn aath mnz, tvpth thvvukh ahndis avuntts petth bnd krith. Ḥẓrt am almvmnynn yylhi vuchh qaflh dramut, tim rvudụ̄ rats athụ̄ jayhi, timav dvp yylhi tim kunhi jayhi vạtith me lbn nh khod bkhvd me czhanddan czhanddan vaps yath jayhi, lhādha pazi yath jayhi qrar krun. Kynhh kalah gczihth khcz yimn nindr tvpth shvngụ̄ yim atithe. Ḥẓrt ṣfvan bn mʿṭl ṣḥabv ṣạbv andrh aakh ṣaḥbah, tim ạsụ̄ qafls pth pth pkan. Kyazi qafls ma āsihe kanhh chyzah vsụ̄ pyvmut, tim ạsụ̄ suh chyz tulan. Tim yylhi aath jayhi vạtụ̄ yythi ns am almvmnyn shvngith ạs, timn āv bvznh aakh ansanah shvngith, nzdyk yylhi vạtụ̄ ahndis buthis petth pyykh nẓr, yimav prznạv tvpth pvr timav aina llh vaina ailyh rajʿuuvna. Yhi prnh sintụ̄ gyhi tim hushyar. Vuchhukh ṣfvan bn mʿṭl. Srimbarks petth trvvukh ridae mbark. Yhi ṣfvan bn mʿṭl zaniha timn prduk ḥkm nạzl spdnh brvntth. Chnanchh timav kvrpysh panun avuntt. ʿrẓ kvrhkh tvhụ̄ spdiv ḥẓ aath petth svar. Ahi pth avn timav panun avuntt, suh byhnvvukh am almvmnyn brvntth knhi, timh spz tth petth svar prdh krith. Avuntth snz raz rtt ṣfvan bn mʿln aaths mnz, tvpth hyvtukh brvntth brvntth pakun yvt tanụ̄ qafls nishhi vạtụ̄. ʿbd Allah bn aby yus mnafq khbyth, dshmn rsvli krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm avs, timn lj yhi kthah aaths mnz, tmụ̄ hyvt vạhy tbạhy vvrun. Bʿẓ sydyn sadn mslmann petth thi sapud rmụ̄ sndi vvrnuk athr. Timav thi hyvt aamuyk tdhkrh krun mthlaan ḥẓrt msṭḥ th ḥẓrt ḥsan mrdav andrh. Ḥẓrt ḥmnh znanv andrh, ḥẓrt am almvmnyn rẓy Allah ʿnha byyhi sarine mslman ṣḥab ṣạbn, byyhi khod bdhat rsvl krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslmn sapud aamuyk skht ṣdmh. Akis ryts tanụ̄ rvud yhi qṣh yithe pạtthụ̄. Akhi ryth pth spdụ̄ yim āyat krymh am almvmnyn sndis brats andr nạzl. Ae mslmanv, yuthnh yhi aapuz vaqʿh tvhụ̄ zạniv pnnhi khạr ychh th nakarh blkh chhu yhi tuhndi khạṭr rut th bhtr baaʿtbari anjam, tuhndi khạṭr chhunh yth andr kanhh ẓryr albth aamuyk chrchh krvunyn chhu ẓrvr aamuyk ẓryr. Akis chhu tyvut gnah yvut tmụ̄ aath aapzis mnz ḥṣh nyvumut chhu, zyvi sintụ̄yhi qṣh mshhvr krn valyn chhu zyade gnah. Bvzn valyn dilh sintụ̄ bdgmạny krn valyn pnnhi pnnhi mqdar mvjvb prth akis aamuyk gnah. Byyhi yymụ̄ shkhṣn aath mnz bvdd ḥṣh hyvt, tihindi khạṭr chhu bvdd ʿdhab suh gvv mnafqn hund ziyutth ʿbdAllah bn aby, yymụ̄ yhi aapz khbr phhlạv, tth andr skht kvshsh kr, tihindi khạr chhu sza nari jhnm.
Tohyhi yylhi yhi khbr bvzạyvh baayman mrdv th baayman znanv, kvnh niyvu panh vạnụ̄ pnnhi ḥqh rut guman byyhi kvnh dpyvv yhi chhu ṣryḥ th nvn aapuz.

Byyhi hrgah ne khdaesund fẓl th rḥmt tohyhi petth dnyahs th ạkhrts mnz āsiha, ae ḥsan, ae misṭḥ, ae ḥmnh. Tohyhi ratthi ha ẓrvr aath kamhi mnz aacznh khạṭr, aath mnz shmvlyt krnh khạṭr bvdd ʿdhab.

Yylhi tvhụ̄ aakh akis vnan ạsiv pnnyv zyvav sintụ̄, ty avs tuhndyv chanttyv nyran yymich nh tohyhi khbre ạs, byyhi ạsiv tvhụ̄ zanan shle kthah lokttue mʿāmlah, ḥalankh suh chhu khdays nishhi setthah bvdd chyz yʿny gnah kbyrh. Kyazi pak znanhi thmt lagnụ̄, yhi chhu gnahi kbyrh, vonụ̄ lagnụ̄ thmt nby krym snzi mḥtrm grvajnhi, yhi kvtah gnah chhu. Pzipạtthụ̄ yim lvukh yim vaẓḥ āyat nạzl spdnh pth thi khvạhsh chhi thavan kh ychh kthh gczhh phhlnhi th shayʿ spdnhi mslmann andr, tihindi khạṭr chhu dnyahs andr th ạkhrts andr dvd th dg tulh vun ʿdhab. Byyhi chhu Allah tʿālyā svrue zanh vun, tvhụ̄ chhiv nh zanan.
Byyhi ne khdae sund fẓl th rḥmt tohyhi petth āsiha, byyhi ne Allah tʿālyā mhrban th rḥmt vvl āsiha, tvhụ̄ bch hiv nh tihindi ʿdhabh nishhi.

Byyhi mah hạvin qsm tohyhi andrh dyny fẓylt vạlụ̄ th dnyạvy vsʿt vạlụ̄, tim kya āsn nh mal panun divan ạshnavn th mskynn byyhi mhajrn yimav khdae snzi vathi andr hjrt krmcz āshi. Aamhi andrh chhu murad ḥẓrt abv bkr ṣdyqs trghyb duyn kh tim yus amdad pnnis ạshnav ḥẓrt musḥṭs divan chhi suh thạvin jạry, aamhi qṣvr mokhh mah krin suh bnd, tmis krin qṣvr mʿāf. Tuhund gczihh mʿāf krun, drguzr krun tihund qṣvr, kya tvhụ̄ chhiv na psnd kran kh Allah tʿālyā kya kri tuhndyn gnahn mghfrt, tylhi ạsiv tvhụ̄ thi byyan hund qṣvr mʿāf kran. Pzipạtthụ̄ yim bdkạry hnz hanczh lagn pak th be khbr baayman znann timn yiyhi lʿnt krnh dnyahs th ạkhrts andr byyhi chhu tihindi khạṭr bvdd ʿdhab.
Tth bddis ʿdhabs gczhn grftar tamhi doh yymhi doh gvạhy din timn khlaf zyvh tihinz byyhi aathh tihindụ̄ byyhi khor tihindụ̄ timn sarine kamyn hnz yim tim lvukh kran ạsụ̄.

Napak znanh chhe napak mrdn hndi khạṭrh, napak mrd chhi napak znann hndi khạṭrh, pak znanh chhe pak mrdn hndi khạṭrh, pak mrd chhi pak znann hndi khạṭrh. Tim pak mrd th pak znanh chhe balkl bry timav kthv nishhi yimh kthh lvukh vnn, tihindi khạṭr chhu bvdd mghfrt byyhi ʿztuk rzq.

Yithe pạtthụ̄ yylhi Allah tʿālyā chhu baayman sndis dils andr hdaytuk nvur vatnavan tmis chhu doh khoth doh qbvli ḥq khạṭr dil muczrnh yivan. Prth vqth chhu aḥkami alhāy bja aannh khạṭr tyar rvzan. Time mrd yimn nh āvur chhu kran khdae sndi yad nishhi, nemaz qạyim thavnh nishhi, zkvāh ada krnh nishhi, kanhh karvbarah, nh kanhh tjartah. Ḥdyth shryfs nadr chhu āmut znann hnz gry nemaz prns varyah fẓylt, tihindi khạṭr chhe gre msjdh. Anjam timn lvukn hundd āshi kh Allah tʿālyā diyhi timn rut bdlh tihnzn rczn ʿmln hund yimh ʿmlh timav krimaczh āsn, byyhi hurravykh mvzvurụ̄ pnnhi fẓlh sintụ̄ Allah tʿālyā chhu dʿā kran ys yczhan chhu ts ḥsabh rvstue.
